root: ^What happened to getting me a StarBadge?
^I don't see your ass in there doing the Pop Quiz.
^I don't care how you do it.
^You're no longer safe now that Little Charlie's gone, y'know?
^Word is he's been MIA for 24 hours.
^Now, you better shape up before you get shipped out.
^It would have always been you if it weren't for Charlie.
^Jun looks to his left and his heart drops the second his eyes meet Charlie's
^Dark and soulless behind the dofftextured "Missing Person" poster.
